result.eng: He put on his work clothes.
result.ga: Chuir sé uime a chulaith oibre
result.orig: Chuir sé uime a chulaith oibre
result.html: Chuir sé uime a chulaith oibreHe put on his work clothes.
result.ponchtml: Ċuir sé uime a ċulaiṫ oibreHe put on his work clothes.

result.ga: Is maith liom an chulaith dhubh
result.orig: Is maith liom an chulaith dhubh
result.html: Is maith liom an chulaith dhubhI like the black suit.
result.ponchtml: Is maiṫ liom an ċulaiṫ ḋuḃI like the black suit.

result.eng: That bathing suit is not very nice.
result.ga: Níl an chulaith snámha sin an-deas
result.orig: Níl an chulaith snámha sin an-deas
result.html: Níl an chulaith snámha sin an-deasThat bathing suit is not very nice.
result.ponchtml: Níl an ċulaiṫ snáṁa sin an-deasThat bathing suit is not very nice.
